Name: Inspect web vitals
Description: Can I inspect web vital statistics like CLS, LCP, FIP, etc.,

Notes: 1. Open **App settings** > Under the **Settings** tab, select **Web Vitals Status**. This will add a tiny icon in the bottom left of the page.
2. Click the icon to open a popup containing the various web vital statistics like CLS, LCP, FIP, etc.,
3. Click the eye icon to inspect the stats directly on the page.
